body: Great crossover lol
tbh I don't like the crossover thing but diisuke's art is hot as usual so It's alright to me...

So I was wrong, since I figured Eirin and her husband were just making a cameo because world-building. I haven't done an in-depth translation, but it seems Eirin is suggesting using her husband's sperm to "weaken" Urumi's ovum(s) enough that Urumi would have a higher chance of conception if she then has sex with her own husband right afterwards. I...don't think that's how conception works (really, I'd probably have to research this), but yeah. The P-cup Eirin protag gets to fuck both of them. As an side, I found the fact that Eirin outright calls Urumi an NTR heroine funny.
That's the crossover we needed. I, for one, welcome the shared universe of Diisuke's works.
holy thiccness!
